data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Yulin, Guangxi, China.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yulin, Guangxi, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Yulin who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 46 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Yulin, Guangxi, China.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, defend your people in the county of Yulin against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Yulin, Guangxi, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Dongnu people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Dongnu people.
Lord, make the 47,201 believers in Yulin to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 575,000 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Yulin do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Yulin, Guangxi, China that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.
